about_the_game:
Neural construct is a 2-4 player educational online party game that allows you to construct a neural network (AI) that you can change and customize to compete with other players.

Gameplay :
  • Try to construct a neural network with the resources and intel that you have.
  • Try to accomplish the given task to gain points.
  • Sabotage the other players.
  • Adapt quickly!
  • Win by completing your given task and having the most points.
  • Learn about neural networks while having fun.
  • Why are you trying to push me over the edge?
